revision.comment: Omega moved page [[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 10X]] to [[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 10X (ER-10X)]]
revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=EdgeRouter |revision=10X (ER-10X) |upc=817882023917 |asin=B07RQ33Y7F |newegg=9SIA3899CU8640 |price=109 |est_release_date=May 2019 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=Currently Shipping |type=router |flags=PoE in/out, metal case, |pwr_v=24 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L1608EMII-12G |fla2=512 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX30LF4G18AC-TI |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6GE16EWXD-12H |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, RJ45 console,, (57600,8,N,1), |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367RB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=9 |addl_chips=Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3221C;;1;,,, 3A, 36V, 500kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT7272B;;1;,,, 1MHz, 2.0A, Synchronous-Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi; uP9617;;2;,,, 3-State Octal Buffer/Line Driver;Philips Electronics;LVC244A;;1;,,, Dual Positive Edge Triggered Flip-Flop;Texas Instruments;CD74AC109;;1;,,, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;UBNT Build Version: e55_001_8fcb8 |stock_os=Linux;4.14.54;EdgeOS (Debian 9 base) |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt |oui_eth=74:83:C2 }} {{TagLine|10-Port High-Performance Gigabit Router with PoE Flexibility}} :[https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/edgerouter-10x/ Product page] (ER-10X)
